IntegrationProviderDef.name: IntegrationProviderDef
IntegrationProviderDef.description: Represents the definition that's applicable to an integration provider.

ApexClassId.description: The apex class that's associated with the definition.

CanUseInIntegrationOrch.description: Indicates whether the integration definition can be used in an integration orchestration (true) or not (false).

Description.description: The description about the integration provider definition.

DeveloperName.description: The developer name of the integration provider definition.

ExternalServiceOperationName.description: The external service registration that's associated with the integration provider.

FileBasedApexClass.description: The API name of the file-based apex class.

InputDataProcessorId.description: The input data processor that's associated with the integration provider.

IsActive.description: Indicates whether the integration provider is active (true) or inactive (false).

IsManual.description: Indicates whether the integration definition mode is manual (true) or automatic (false).

IsServiceTypeIntegration.description: Indicates whether the integration definition mode is Service Type (True) or Process Type (False).

Language.description: The language of the integration provider definition.

MasterLabel.description: A unique name of the integration provider definition.

NamespacePrefix.description: Namespace prefix associated with this object.

OmniUiCardConfigId.description: The FlexCard component associated with the integration provider. Available in API version 61.0 and later.

OutputDataProcessorId.description: The output data processor that's associated with the integration provider.

StorePayload.description: Specifies whether the JSON payload from the request and response must be saved in logs.

Type.description: Specifies the type of definition that's defined for an integration provider.
